pkgmetadata.longdescription: Continuous Cartogram // Procedures for making continuous cartogram. Procedures available are: flow based cartogram (Gastner Newman (2004) doi:10.1073/pnas.0400280101), fast flow based cartogram (Gastner, Seguy More (2018) doi:10.1073/pnas.1712674115), rubber band based cartogram (Dougenik et al. (1985) doi:10.1111/j.0033-0124.1985.00075.x).
